resources.string: The Grocery Store is online shopping mobile application, it will handle whole the activities of the grocery shopping. The system helps in buying of goods, products and services online by choosing the listed products from application. We build an Android application to buy, sell products or goods online using internet connection. Purchasing of goods online, user can choose different products based on categories, online payments , delivery services.

General Benefits 
 

• Total Protection Against Data Loss.
 • Independence and Security.
 • Reduce the Workload.
 • Reduce IT Cost and Overall Cost.
 • Make all the system computerize.
 • Reduce time consumption.
 • Reduce error scope.
 • All system managements are automated.
 • Centralized database management.
 • Easy operations for operator of the system.
 • No paper work requirement.
